page.title: 19SCHOOLS: Longcroft
page.content:
{ Longcroft Junior School}will be closing this week. We had our last concert on 11th July, and our last assembly will be on our last day, 16th July. All the pupils will be getting a gift from the P.T.A. We are moving down to{Almondbury Junior School,}and I am very sad to leave Longcroft.
Longcroft is a sad school. Boxes everywhere. Scattered in quiet corners And shared areas. Thursday held The last concert, And now The last day is here! Longcroft is a sad school. {But hooray for Longcroft.}
